sender_contact_msg: Sender will contact you in case of a match
deliver_msg: Deliver the item to get paid
congrats_delivery_msg:
Congrats! You delivered the item.
Funds will be transferred to your account very soon.
about_info:
Use /connect command to connect your wallet (requires Tonkeeper app).'

Use /start to create an item or a trip. As soon as we will find a match - you will get an update from this bot.

To start showing possible transporter contacts we will take a 2% fee first.'
After start getting contacts - choose any transporter you want and make a contact.

'If you are a transporter - just create a trip and wait till someone contact you. Collect the item, deliver it and get your bonus.

'This is an alfa-version. Soon we will make the whole process on smart-contracts.

'Also we collect some anonymous data for performance analysis.
'Stay tuned.
